text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/alternative-title-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
language Different languageAlternative form of title or abstract is a different language.
autotranslated Different language derived from autotranslationAlternative form of title or abstract is a different language, language element codes the language into which it was translated by machine.
duplicatePmid Different text in additional Medline entryAlternative form of title or abstract in two or more Medline entries.
earlierTitle Different text in an earlier versionAlternative form of title or abstract in an earlier version such as epub ahead of print.
subtitle SubtitleSubtitle or Secondary title.

name: AlternativeTitleType
title: AlternativeTitleType
description: Used to express the reason and specific aspect for the variant title, such as language and specific language.

concept.definition: Alternative form of title or abstract is a different language.
Alternative form of title or abstract is a different language, language element codes the language into which it was translated by machine.

concept.display: Different text in additional Medline entry
concept.definition: Alternative form of title or abstract  in two or more Medline entries.

concept.display: Different text in an earlier version
concept.definition: Alternative form of title or abstract in an earlier version such as epub ahead of print.
